item.title: Is misogyny a hate crime?
item.author: Dr. Yenushi Hirimuthugoda,
item.description: Why are you getting so emotional? Stop being a drama queen! C’mon now, can’t you take a joke? Calm down! Why are you getting so worked up? That time of the month, eh? When are you getting married? When are you going to have children? Your biological clock is ticking! What do you mean, you don’t want …
